body.content: Niccolò, your insight into balancing boldness with prudence is well-observed. Indeed, a steady flow of goods, like those flour contracts, is the very foundation of lasting prosperity. Perhaps our combined approaches could secure even greater stability for our ventures. I am keen to learn more of your 'new canals' for reliable supply.

reflection: Responding to Niccolò's philosophical yet pragmatic view on speculation, I affirmed his wisdom while subtly steering the conversation back to concrete, stable trade opportunities, specifically the flour contracts. My aim is to explore how his 'new canals' – innovative supply methods – could benefit my own challenges with deliveries, aligning with my persona's focus on cautious, mutually beneficial growth and strengthening our commercial ties.
